headline: Is Ballard Power Systems (BLDP) Stock Outpacing Its Utilities Peers This Year?

headline: The Power To Care: Supporting Arkansas Customers When They Need It Most
summary: By Claire Kreuz NORTHAMPTON, MA / ACCESS Newswire / December 5, 2025 / No one should have to choose between keeping the lights on and paying for food or medicine. However, we understand that many of our older adult customers and customers with disabilities ...

headline: Does New Louisiana Gas Buildout And Meta Deal Change The Bull Case For Entergy (ETR)?
summary: Entergy Louisiana has recently broken ground on two newly approved combined-cycle natural gas plants that will add about 1,500 megawatts of efficient generation capacity to support reliability and economic growth in north Louisiana. A key component of the plan is Meta's new data center investment, which is expected to enhance grid resilience and deliver roughly US$650 million in customer savings over 15 years. We will now examine how the new gas capacity and Meta-backed customer savings...
